description: Schema for submitting a series of analysis for a given data type.
title: Pipeline

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type

___description.description: A place to provide a curated discription of the pipeline.  Only wranglers can post
___description.title: Description

___source_url.description: An external resource to the code base.
___source_url.title: Source URL

___analysis_steps.description: The particular computational analysis steps used by the pipeline.
___analysis_steps.title: Analysis steps

items.description: A particular computational analysis step used by the pipeline.
items.comment: See analysis_step.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: Analysis step

___pipeline_version.comment: Please increment as whole numbers starting from 1.
___pipeline_version.title: Pipeline version

___title.description: The preferred viewable name of the pipeline.
___title.title: Title

___standards_page.description: An link to a page describing the standards for this pipeline.
___standards_page.title: Standards page for this pipeline

___alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
___alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
___alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate Accession

___assay_term_names.description: Assay names the pipeline is compatible with.
___assay_term_names.comment: A list of assay names that could be processed by the pipeline.
___assay_term_names.title: Assay names

items.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology term for the assay.
items.title: Assay name
enum: CRISPR genome editing followed by RNA-seq
DNA methylation profiling by array assay
genotyping by high throughput sequencing assay
protein sequencing by tandem mass spectrometry assay
single cell isolation followed by RNA-seq
